column4: hello everyone i need help urgently, today, when i woke up, turn pc on to check mail, and ubuntu had some updates, install them turn pc off and gone to school, now, when i start pc, ubuntu stops at at load, the progress bar stays at 0 or 1 % and doesnt move more, in grub its diferent, and i have a kernel version as secund option, that is older, i select it, it boots but without x server, anyone can help me ?
it was working like a charm before that
with the old kernel booted, reinstall the updates
